channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After 59 years of fighting for the underdog, the NUJ has elected me as a Life Member
item.description: Fleetstreet legend and Mirror columnist, Paul Routledge, sends gentle tales from his West Yorkshire allotment, Mrs R’s pantry and the Old White Bear. ...

item.title: Gurning champion is so good she’s just won it for the eighth year in a row
item.description: The act of pulling silly faces is an art form, perfected over time, with competitors returning year after year to take part.

item.title: Woolwich stabbing: Two arrested on suspicion of murder as victim, 15, named
item.description: Two people have been arrested by detectives who have today named the teenage victim of a stabbing in Woolwich as Daejuan Campbell who was found lying ...

item.title: Market town’s art gallery in hot water over very fruity window display
item.description: Artist Poppy Baynam said women who object are probably heterosexual and have never seen a vulva.

item.title: Three 4p drinks every day could 'slash diabetes, heart disease and stroke risk'
item.description: A new study has found that regularly consuming a certain popular drink could reduce your risk of developing multiple cardiometabolic diseases - and it...

item.title: The ‘nuclear test’ spotted by a satellite nobody’s owning up to 45 years later
item.description: The double flash could have been a nuclear explosion of two to three kilotonnes - equivalent to 2-3,000 tonnes of TNT.

item.title: Burglar who stole £13,000 of laptops walks free after judge cites prison overcrowding
item.description: Serial burglar Luke Handley, 41, avoids jail for £13,000 laptop raid despite an appalling record of more than 53 previous crimes as judge cites the pr...

item.title: Zoo’s ‘barking’ pandas turned out to be painted dogs
item.description: People have, understandably, asked for their money back.

item.title: Women's prisons could close as Justice Secretary makes major announcement
item.description: Justice Secretary Shabana Mahmood branded women’s prisons 'desperate places' that are 'hurting mothers and breaking homes' and 'forcing women into a l...

item.title: YouTuber ‘plays with death’ as he enters bear cave moments before it returns
item.description: Influencer Stefan Jankovich is the newest contestant for scariest stunt of the year, as he willingly sits in a bear cave waiting for it the return.
